text.section:
Except as otherwise provided in subsection (b) of this section, a contractor or subcontractor may not pay or otherwise compensate another contractor or subcontractor or a salesperson for performing or selling a home improvement unless:
the person to be paid or compensated is licensed;
the person to be paid or compensated is not subject to the licensing requirements of this title; or
the transaction for which the consideration is to be paid is not subject to this title.

After the expiration, suspension, or revocation of a license, a person:
is not relieved of outstanding obligations; and
may complete and be paid under a home improvement contract that is made but not performed on the date of the expiration, suspension, or revocation.
